intro.title: Welcome to the @nimpl/i18n {{page}} page
intro.description:
For the heading above, the getter <getterLink>getTranslation</getterLink> is used with the given request page, 
and to add links to this text, the <componentLink>ServerTranslation</componentLink> component with the given components is used.

homeContent.title: This page describes in detail about the company - what you do, what your goals are, reasons, history. <link>See page code</link>.

contactsContent.title: This page describes in detail the company contacts - phones, emails, and addresses. <link>See page code</link>.

additional.needClientSideLogic: Also, the page may need client-side logic and client components can be added for this.
additional.toTransfer: To transfer translations to them, you need to transfer the necessary keys at the server level through the <link>WithTranslations</link> transmitter.
additional.additinalBonus: An additional bonus of the approach is that if there are conditions within the component, the transfer of translations can be included in them.
additional.onThisPage: On this page, the client component {{component}} is displayed by condition, and accordingly, transfers are transferred to the client only for this component.

additionalHome.additionalAboutCompany: There may be additional information about your company, for example, founders, capital.
additionalHome.headerAbove: For the header above, the <hookLink>useTranslation</hookLink> client hook is used, and to add links to these texts, the <componentLink>ClientTranslation</componentLink> component is used with the given components.

additionalContacts.additionalContacts: There may be additional contacts here, such as telephone numbers, social networks, addresses.
additionalContacts.headerAbove: For the header above, the <hookLink>useTranslation</hookLink> client hook is used, and to add links to these texts, the <componentLink>ClientTranslation</componentLink> component is used with the given components.
